action.action-desc: Mr. Blum introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit former Members of Congress from lobbying Members, officers, or employees of Congress.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Golden Parachutes for Public Service Act.

section.header: Prohibition against lobbying of Congress by former Members

subsection.text: Section 207(e)(1)(A) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking within 2 years.

subsection.header: Members and Officers of the House of Representatives
subsection.text: Section 207(e)(1)(B)(i) of such title is amended by striking within 1 year.

section.text: The amendments made by this Act shall apply with respect to individuals who leave office on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
